list.definition: query_result(sort_desc(bosh_job_healthy{bosh_deployment=~"$deployment"} * on (bosh_job_ip) group_left(engine,set) max by (engine,set,bosh_job_ip) (label_replace(mongodb_mongod_storage_engine{engine="wiredTiger"},"bosh_job_ip","$1","instance","(^.*):.*") * on (bosh_job_ip) group_left(set) max by (set,bosh_job_ip) (label_replace(mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state{},"bosh_job_ip","$1","instance","(^.*):.*")))))
list.label: Instance
list.name: instance
list.query: query_result(sort_desc(bosh_job_healthy{bosh_deployment=~"$deployment"} * on (bosh_job_ip) group_left(engine,set) max by (engine,set,bosh_job_ip) (label_replace(mongodb_mongod_storage_engine{engine="wiredTiger"},"bosh_job_ip","$1","instance","(^.*):.*") * on (bosh_job_ip) group_left(set) max by (set,bosh_job_ip) (label_replace(mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state{},"bosh_job_ip","$1","instance","(^.*):.*")))))
